code: import{loadUsers}from"./loadUsers";export var loadDeleteUser=function loadDeleteUser(_ref){var id=_ref.id;return function(dispatch){var options={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json;charset=utf-8"},body:JSON.stringify({id:id})};fetch("http://wsuno.xyz:8111/deleteUser",options).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){if(!data.OK){throw Error('Ошибка запроса на сервер');}dispatch(loadUsers({userId:localStorage.userId/1}));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
